SELECT EVENT_NM, LAWFIRM_NM, MAX(LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM) LAWSUIT_TRGT_CD , MAX(CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, MAX(CNT) as cnt, TO_CHAR(SUM(exp01),'999,999,999,999.99') exp01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for01),'999,999,999,999.99') for01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp02),'999,999,999,999.99') exp02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for02),'999,999,999,999.99') for02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp03),'999,999,999,999.99') exp03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for03),'999,999,999,999.99') for03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp04),'999,999,999,999.99') exp04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for04),'999,999,999,999.99') for04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp05),'999,999,999,999.99') exp05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for05),'999,999,999,999.99') for05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp06),'999,999,999,999.99') exp06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for06),'999,999,999,999.99') for06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp07),'999,999,999,999.99') exp07 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for07),'999,999,999,999.99') for07 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp08),'999,999,999,999.99') exp08 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for08),'999,999,999,999.99') for08 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp09),'999,999,999,999.99') exp09 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for09),'999,999,999,999.99') for09 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp10),'999,999,999,999.99') exp10 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for10),'999,999,999,999.99') for10 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp11),'999,999,999,999.99') exp11 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for11),'999,999,999,999.99') for11 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp12),'999,999,999,999.99') exp12 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for12),'999,999,999,999.99') for12 , TO_CHAR((SUM(exp01) + SUM(exp02) + SUM(exp03) + SUM(exp04) + SUM(exp05) + SUM(exp06) + SUM(exp07) + SUM(exp08) + SUM(exp09) + SUM(exp10) + SUM(exp11) + SUM(exp12)),'999,999,999,999.99') as expsum, TO_CHAR((SUM(for01) + SUM(for02) + SUM(for03) + SUM(for04) + SUM(for05) + SUM(for06) + SUM(for07) + SUM(for08) + SUM(for09) + SUM(for10) + SUM(for11) + SUM(for12)),'999,999,999,999.99') as forsum FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () CNT, exp2.EVENT_NM , exp3.LAWFIRM_NM , exp2.LAWSUIT_TRGT , exp1.CRRNCY_UNIT CRRNCY_UNIT , exp4.CD_NM LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOTAMT,0),0) as for01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOTAMT,0),0) as for02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp03, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', TOTAMT,0),0) as for03, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'04', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp04, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'04', TOTAMT,0),0) as for04, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'05', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'05', TOTAMT,0),0) as for05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', TOTAMT,0),0) as for06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', TOTAMT,0),0) as for07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', TOTAMT,0),0) as for08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', TOTAMT,0),0) as for09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', TOTAMT,0),0) as for10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', TOTAMT,0),0) as for11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp12, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', TOTAMT,0),0) as for12 FROM ( SELECT A.EVENT_NO, A.LAWFIRM_ID,
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.ACPTDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.SRVCENDDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.CLAIMDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
MAX(A.CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, SUM(B.TOTAMT) TOTAMT, SUM(B.TOT_REMIT_AMT) TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND A.EVENT_NO = c.EVENT_NO
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) AND B.REMITDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' AND B.REMITDAY IS NOT NULL #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) AND A.ACPTDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) AND A.SRVCENDDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) AND A.CLAIMDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if (!$vo.srch_group_cd.equals("")) --AND B.INTNL_DEPT_CD LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_group_cd + '%' AND B.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_group_cd + '%' #end
#if (!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND A.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawfirm_id.equals("")) AND A.LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.srch_lawfirm_id #end
#if (!$vo.srch_kbn1.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN1 = :vo.srch_kbn1 #if (!$vo.srch_kbn2.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN2 = :vo.srch_kbn2 #end #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd.equals("")) AND C.LAWSUIT_TRGT = :vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd #end
GROUP BY A.EVENT_NO, LAWFIRM_ID,
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.ACPTDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.SRVCENDDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.CLAIMDAY,1,6) #end
) exp1,
TN_LAS_EVENTMNG exp2, ( SELECT * from TN_LAS_LAWFIRMMNG ) exp3, ( SELECT CD, CD_NM from TB_COM_CD where GRP_CD = '105' ) exp4
WHERE exp1.EVENT_NO = exp2.EVENT_NO and exp1.LAWFIRM_ID = exp3.LAWFIRM_ID and exp2.LAWSUIT_TRGT = exp4.CD(+)
) ext1
GROUP BY ext1.EVENT_NM, ext1.LAWFIRM_NM

SELECT LAWFIRM_NM, EVENT_NM, MAX(CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, MAX(CNT) as cnt, MAX(LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM) LAWSUIT_TRGT_CD, TO_CHAR(SUM(exp01),'999,999,999,999.99') exp01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for01),'999,999,999,999.99') for01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp02),'999,999,999,999.99') exp02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for02),'999,999,999,999.99') for02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp03),'999,999,999,999.99') exp03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for03),'999,999,999,999.99') for03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp04),'999,999,999,999.99') exp04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for04),'999,999,999,999.99') for04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp05),'999,999,999,999.99') exp05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for05),'999,999,999,999.99') for05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp06),'999,999,999,999.99') exp06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for06),'999,999,999,999.99') for06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp07),'999,999,999,999.99') exp07 , LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM, exp2.EVENT_NM, exp3.LAWFIRM_NM , exp1.CRRNCY_UNIT CRRNCY_UNIT , ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOTAMT,0),0) as for01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOTAMT,0),0) as for02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp03, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', TOTAMT,0),0) as for03, TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'05', TOTAMT,0),0) as for05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', TOTAMT,0),0) as for06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', TOTAMT,0),0) as for07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', TOTAMT,0),0) as for08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', TOTAMT,0),0) as for09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', TOTAMT,0),0) as for10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', TOTAMT,0),0) as for11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp12, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', TOTAMT,0),0) as for12 FROM ( SELECT A.EVENT_NO, A.LAWFIRM_ID,
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.ACPTDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end

MAX(A.CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, SUM(B.TOTAMT) TOTAMT, SUM(B.TOT_REMIT_AMT) TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND A.EVENT_NO = c.EVENT_NO
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) AND B.REMITDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' AND B.REMITDAY IS NOT NULL #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) AND A.ACPTDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end

#if (!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND A.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawfirm_id.equals("")) AND A.LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.srch_lawfirm_id #end
#if (!$vo.srch_kbn1.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN1 = :vo.srch_kbn1 #if (!$vo.srch_kbn2.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN2 = :vo.srch_kbn2 #end #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd.equals("")) AND C.LAWSUIT_TRGT = :vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd #end

#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) #end

) ext1

SELECT CRRNCY_UNIT, MAX(CNT) as cnt, MAX(LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM) LAWSUIT_TRGT_CD,
TO_CHAR(SUM(exp01)) exp01_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for01)) for01_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp02)) exp02_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for02)) for02_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp03)) exp03_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for03)) for03_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp04)) exp04_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for04)) for04_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp05)) exp05_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for05)) for05_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp06)) exp06_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for06)) for06_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp07)) exp07_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for07)) for07_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp08)) exp08_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for08)) for08_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp09)) exp09_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for09)) for09_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp10)) exp10_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for10)) for10_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp11)) exp11_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for11)) for11_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp12)) exp12_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(for12)) for12_no_comma , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp01) + SUM(exp02) + SUM(exp03) + SUM(exp04) + SUM(exp05) + SUM(exp06) + SUM(exp07) + SUM(exp08) + SUM(exp09) + SUM(exp10) + SUM(exp11) + SUM(exp12)) as expsum_no_comma, TO_CHAR(SUM(for01) + SUM(for02) + SUM(for03) + SUM(for04) + SUM(for05) + SUM(for06) + SUM(for07) + SUM(for08) + SUM(for09) + SUM(for10) + SUM(for11) + SUM(for12)) as forsum_no_comma,
TO_CHAR(SUM(exp01),'999,999,999,999.99') exp01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for01),'999,999,999,999.99') for01 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp02),'999,999,999,999.99') exp02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for02),'999,999,999,999.99') for02 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp03),'999,999,999,999.99') exp03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for03),'999,999,999,999.99') for03 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp04),'999,999,999,999.99') exp04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for04),'999,999,999,999.99') for04 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp05),'999,999,999,999.99') exp05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for05),'999,999,999,999.99') for05 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp06),'999,999,999,999.99') exp06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for06),'999,999,999,999.99') for06 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp07),'999,999,999,999.99') exp07 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for07),'999,999,999,999.99') for07 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp08),'999,999,999,999.99') exp08 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for08),'999,999,999,999.99') for08 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp09),'999,999,999,999.99') exp09 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for09),'999,999,999,999.99') for09 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp10),'999,999,999,999.99') exp10 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for10),'999,999,999,999.99') for10 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp11),'999,999,999,999.99') exp11 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for11),'999,999,999,999.99') for11 , TO_CHAR(SUM(exp12),'999,999,999,999.99') exp12 , TO_CHAR(SUM(for12),'999,999,999,999.99') for12 , TO_CHAR((SUM(exp01) + SUM(exp02) + SUM(exp03) + SUM(exp04) + SUM(exp05) + SUM(exp06) + SUM(exp07) + SUM(exp08) + SUM(exp09) + SUM(exp10) + SUM(exp11) + SUM(exp12)),'999,999,999,999.99') as expsum, TO_CHAR((SUM(for01) + SUM(for02) + SUM(for03) + SUM(for04) + SUM(for05) + SUM(for06) + SUM(for07) + SUM(for08) + SUM(for09) + SUM(for10) + SUM(for11) + SUM(for12)),'999,999,999,999.99') as forsum FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () CNT, exp4.CD_NM LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM, exp2.EVENT_NM, exp3.LAWFIRM_NM , exp1.CRRNCY_UNIT CRRNCY_UNIT , ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOTAMT,0),0) as for01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp02, #if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end

FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () CNT, exp4.CD_NM LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM, exp2.EVENT_NM, exp3.LAWFIRM_NM , exp1.CRRNCY_UNIT CRRNCY_UNIT , ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'01', USD_AMT,0),0) as for01, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'02', USD_AMT,0),0) as for02, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp03, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'03', USD_AMT,0),0) as for03, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'04', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp04, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'04', USD_AMT,0),0) as for04, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'05', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'05', USD_AMT,0),0) as for05, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'06', USD_AMT,0),0) as for06, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'07', USD_AMT,0),0) as for07, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'08', USD_AMT,0),0) as for08, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'09', USD_AMT,0),0) as for09, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'10', USD_AMT,0),0) as for10, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'11', USD_AMT,0),0) as for11, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', TOT_REMIT_AMT,0),0) as exp12, ISNULL(decode(SUBSTRING(exp1.ex_month,5,6),'12', USD_AMT,0),0) as for12 FROM ( SELECT A.EVENT_NO, A.LAWFIRM_ID,
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.ACPTDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.SRVCENDDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.CLAIMDAY,1,6) AS ex_month , #end
MAX(A.CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, SUM(B.USD_AMT) USD_AMT, SUM(B.TOT_REMIT_AMT) TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND A.EVENT_NO = c.EVENT_NO
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) AND B.REMITDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' AND B.REMITDAY IS NOT NULL #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) AND A.ACPTDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) AND A.SRVCENDDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) AND A.CLAIMDAY LIKE :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if (!$vo.srch_group_cd.equals("")) --AND B.INTNL_DEPT_CD LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_group_cd + '%' AND B.DEPT_NM LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_group_cd + '%' #end
#if (!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND A.EVENT_NO = = :vo.srch_event_no #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawfirm_id.equals("")) AND A.LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.srch_lawfirm_id #end
#if (!$vo.srch_kbn1.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN1 = :vo.srch_kbn1 #if (!$vo.srch_kbn2.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN2 = :vo.srch_kbn2 #end #end
#if (!$vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd.equals("")) AND C.LAWSUIT_TRGT = :vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd #end
GROUP BY A.EVENT_NO, LAWFIRM_ID,
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_REMITDAY")) SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_ACPTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.ACPTDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_SRVCSTARTDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.SRVCENDDAY,1,6) #end
#if ($vo.srch_year_type.equals("SRCH_CLAIMDAY")) SUBSTRING(A.CLAIMDAY,1,6) #end
) exp1,
TN_LAS_EVENTMNG exp2, ( SELECT * from TN_LAS_LAWFIRMMNG ) exp3, ( SELECT CD, CD_NM from TB_COM_CD where GRP_CD = '105' ) exp4
WHERE exp1.EVENT_NO = exp2.EVENT_NO and exp1.LAWFIRM_ID = exp3.LAWFIRM_ID and exp2.LAWSUIT_TRGT = exp4.CD(+)
) ext1

SELECT EXP1.*, EXP2.DEPT_NM FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () CNT , INTNL_DEPT_CD, B.CRRNCY_UNIT, TO_CHAR(SUM(A.TOTAMT),'999,999,999,999.99') TOTAMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(A.TOT_REMIT_AMT),'999,999,999,999.99') TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND B.UNPAYDAY IS NOT NULL AND INTNL_DEPT_CD NOT LIKE '12%' AND B.EVENT_NO = C.EVENT_NO
#if (!$vo.srch_year.equals("")) #if ($vo.srch_year.equals("1111")) AND A.REMITDAY > :vo.srch_year #end #if (!$vo.srch_year.equals("1111")) AND A.REMITDAY LIKE '%' + :vo.srch_year + '%' #end
#if (!$vo.srch_kbn1.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN1 = :vo.srch_kbn1 #if (!$vo.srch_kbn2.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_GBN2 = :vo.srch_kbn2 #end #end #end
GROUP BY INTNL_DEPT_CD, B.CRRNCY_UNIT
) EXP1, ( SELECT INTNL_DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM FROM TN_LAS_YEAR_DEPT
WHERE CRTRNDAY = ( SELECT MAX(CRTRNDAY) FROM TN_LAS_YEAR_DEPT )
) EXP2
WHERE EXP1.INTNL_DEPT_CD = EXP2.INTNL_DEPT_CD
ORDER BY EXP1.INTNL_DEPT_CD

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () CNT , ( SELECT EVENT_NM FROM TN_LAS_EVENTMNG WHERE EVENT_NO = B.EVENT_NO ) EVENT_NM, ( SELECT LAWFIRM_NM FROM TN_LAS_LAWFIRMMNG WHERE LAWFIRM_ID = B.LAWFIRM_ID ) LAWFIRM_NM, ( SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD WHERE GRP_CD = '105' AND CD = C.LAWSUIT_TRGT ) LAWSUIT_TRGT_NM, C.LAWSUIT_TRGT, B.CRRNCY_UNIT, B.EVENT_NO, LAWFIRM_ID, B.ACPTDAY, TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.REMITDAY,NULL,A.TOTAMT,0),'999,999,999.99') PRE_FOR_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(A.TOTAMT , '999,999,999.99') TOTAMT , TO_CHAR(A.SRVC_AMT,'999,999,999.99') SRVC_AMT , TO_CHAR(A.ADDTNL_AMT,'999,999,999.99') ADDTNL_AMT, TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.REMITDAY,NULL,0,DECODE(B.CRRNCY_UNIT,'KRW',0,A.TOTAMT)),'999,999,999.99') EXP_AMOUNT_EXP, TO_CHAR(DECODE(A.TOT_REMIT_AMT,NULL,0,A.TOT_REMIT_AMT),'999,999,999.99') TOT_REMIT_AMT, A.REMITDAY FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C
WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND B.EVENT_NO = C.EVENT_NO
#if(!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
#if(!$vo.srch_lawfirm_id.equals("")) AND B.LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.srch_lawfirm_id #end
#if(!$vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd.equals("")) AND C.LAWSUIT_TRGT = :vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd #end
AND B.EVENT_NO IN ( 'US123','US124','US92','EC01','CA01','CA02','E20060222144010','E2006031092950','E20060327133222','E2006041816054', 'E20060425153945','E20060609165950', 'E200702221725','E2007022694451','E20070313143113')
ORDER BY EVENT_NM, LAWFIRM_NM, PRE_FOR_AMOUNT

SELECT EXP1.CRRNCY_UNIT, TO_CHAR(SUM(PRE_FOR_AMOUNT)) PRE_FOR_AMOUNT, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAMT)) TOTAMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(SRVC_AMT)) SRVC_AMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(ADDTNL_AMT)) ADDTNL_AMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(EXP_AMOUNT_EXP)) EXP_AMOUNT_EXP, TO_CHAR(SUM(EXP_AMOUNT)) EXP_AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT B.CRRNCY_UNIT, DECODE(A.REMITDAY,NULL,A.TOTAMT,0) PRE_FOR_AMOUNT , A.TOTAMT, A.SRVC_AMT, A.ADDTNL_AMT, DECODE(A.REMITDAY,NULL,0,DECODE(B.CRRNCY_UNIT,'KRW',0,A.TOTAMT)) EXP_AMOUNT_EXP, DECODE(A.TOT_REMIT_AMT,NULL,0,A.TOT_REMIT_AMT) EXP_AMOUNT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT B, TN_LAS_EVENTMNG C
WHERE A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO AND B.EVENT_NO = C.EVENT_NO
#if(!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND C.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
#if(!$vo.srch_lawfirm_id.equals("")) AND B.LAWFIRM_ID = :vo.srch_lawfirm_id #end
#if(!$vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd.equals("")) AND C.LAWSUIT_TRGT = :vo.srch_lawsuit_trgt_cd #end
AND B.EVENT_NO IN ( 'US123','US124','US92','EC01','CA01','CA02','E20060222144010','E2006031092950','E20060327133222','E2006041816054','E20060425153945', 'E20060609165950', 'E200702221725','E2007022694451','E20070313143113') ) EXP1
GROUP BY EXP1.CRRNCY_UNIT

SELECT EXT1.EVENT_NM, CRRNCY_UNIT, REMITDAY_YEAR, TO_CHAR(SUM(SRVC_AMT),'999,999,999.99') SRVC_AMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(ADDTNL_AMT),'999,999,999.99') ADDTNL_AMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOTAMT),'999,999,999.99') TOTAMT, TO_CHAR(SUM(TOT_REMIT_AMT),'999,999,999.99') TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM ( SELECT EXP2.EVENT_NM, EXP1.REMITDAY_YEAR , EXP1.CRRNCY_UNIT CRRNCY_UNIT , SRVC_AMT, ADDTNL_AMT, TOTAMT, TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.EVENT_NO, A.LAWFIRM_ID, SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,4) REMITDAY_YEAR, MAX(A.CRRNCY_UNIT) CRRNCY_UNIT, SUM(B.SRVC_AMT) SRVC_AMT, SUM(B.ADDTNL_AMT) ADDTNL_AMT , SUM(B.TOTAMT) TOTAMT, SUM(B.TOT_REMIT_AMT) TOT_REMIT_AMT FROM TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT A, TN_LAS_EVENT_ACCEPT_SRVCCOST B WHERE B.REMITDAY IS NOT NULL AND A.ACPT_NO = B.ACPT_NO
#if (!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND A.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
GROUP BY A.EVENT_NO, A.LAWFIRM_ID, SUBSTRING(B.REMITDAY,1,4) ) EXP1,
TN_LAS_EVENTMNG EXP2, TN_LAS_LAWFIRMMNG EXP3, ( SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD WHERE GRP_CD = '105' ) EXP4
WHERE EXP1.EVENT_NO = EXP2.EVENT_NO AND EXP1.LAWFIRM_ID = EXP3.LAWFIRM_ID AND EXP2.LAWSUIT_TRGT = EXP4.CD
#if(!$vo.srch_event_no.equals("")) AND EXP1.EVENT_NO = :vo.srch_event_no #end
) EXT1
GROUP BY EVENT_NM, CRRNCY_UNIT, REMITDAY_YEAR
